patthana22.15:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.15:4.2: Naakusalaṃ nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.15:4.3: Naabyākataṃ nasauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.15:4.4: Naakusalaṃ nasauttarañca naabyākataṃ nasauttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.15:4.5: Nakusalaṃ nasauttarañca naakusalaṃ nasauttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.15:4.7: Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana22.15:5.1: Nakusalaṃ naanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …
patthana22.15:5.3: Hetuyā cha … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
